name: BOXES (Ethel Chamomile)
description:
Play as an unknown girl dubbed the Test Subject through a series of rooms with physic based puzzles while being directed by a mysterious voice from the intercom.

Uncover what's going on and maybe find your way out.

The goal for each room is simple, press buttons to open the door to the next door. Some buttons need to keep being pressed, some don't.

You might even find some unintended solutions to the puzzles as well.

Includes a total of 22 stages with various challenges gimmicks. With short gameplay time, it's fitting for a quick brain sport or streaming content.

Play and see how fast can you figure out the puzzles.

Bonus: Visible character's body~

If you like the game, please consider to also support me at:
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/EthelChamomileChVTuber
Twitter: https://twitter.com/EthelChamomile
Patreon:  https://www.patreon.com/ethelchamomile

Enjoy~
n0n/
